paragraphs.original: 却说惜春正在那里揣摩棋谱，忽听院内有人叫彩屏，不是别人，却是鸳鸯的声儿。彩屏出去，同著鸳鸯进来。那鸳鸯却带著一个小丫头，提了一个小黄绢包儿。惜春笑问道：“什么事？”鸳鸯道：“老太太因明年八十一岁，是个‘暗九’，许下一场九昼夜的功德，发心要写三千六百五十零一部《金刚经》。这已发出外面人写了。但是俗说：《金刚经》就像那道家的符壳，《心经》才算是符胆，故此，《金刚经》内必要插著《心经》，更有功德。老太太因《心经》是更要紧的，观自在又是女菩萨，所以要几个亲丁－－奶奶姑娘们－－写上三百六十五部。如此，又虔诚，又洁净。偺们家中，除了二奶奶－－头一宗，他当家没有空儿；二宗，他也写不上来－－其馀会写字的，不论写得多少，连东府珍大奶奶姨娘们都分了去。本家里头自不用说。”惜春听了，点头道：“别的我做不来，若要写经，我最信心的。你搁下喝茶罢。”鸳鸯才将那小包儿搁在桌上，同惜春坐下。彩屏倒了一锺茶来。惜春笑问道：“你写不写？”鸳鸯道：“姑娘又说笑话了。那几年还好；这三四年来，姑娘还见我拿了拿笔儿么？”惜春道：“这却是有功德的。”鸳鸯道：“我也有一件事：向来伏侍老太太安歇后，自己念念米佛，已经念了三年多了。我把这个米收好，等老太太做功德的时候，我将他衬在里头供佛施食，也是我一点诚心。”惜春道：“这样说来，老太太做了观音，你就是龙女了？”鸳鸯道：“那里跟得上这个分儿？却是除了老太太，别的也伏侍不来，不晓得前世什么缘分儿！”说著要走，叫小丫头把小绢包打开，拿出来道：“这素纸一扎，是写《心经》的。”又拿起一子儿藏香，道：“这是叫写经时点著写的。”
paragraphs.english:
"鸳鸯提着一个黄绢包儿，向惜春说："老太太许下九日的功德，现在发心要写三千六百五十零一部《金刚经》。已经外面人写好啦，但俗说《金刚经》就像那道家的符壳，《心经》才是符胆，所以《金刚经》里一定要插上《心经》，更有功德。老太太因为《心经》是更要紧的，观自在又是一位女菩萨，所以要让几个亲丁-奶奶姑娘们-写上三百六十五部。这样，又虔诚，又洁净。我们家里，除了二奶奶-头一宗，他当家没有空儿；二宗，他也写不上来-其余会写字的，不管写多少，连东府珍大奶奶姨娘们都分了去。"家里头自不用说。"惜春听了，点着头道："别的我做不来，若要写经，我最有信心的。你放下茶碗罢。"鸳鸯才将那小包儿搁在桌上，同惜春坐下。彩屏倒了一锺茶来。"

"Blue cranes are holding a yellow silk bag, talking to Lady Xisun, "The old lady has made a vow to write three thousand, six hundred and fifty zeros of the Diamond Sutra on the ninth day. Now, she has decided to write it out. It is said that the Diamond Sutra is like a talisman in Taoism, and the Heart Sutra is the core of it. Therefore, the Diamond Sutra must include the Heart Sutra, which will add to the merit. The old lady thinks that the Heart Sutra is more important, and Avalokitesvara is a female Buddha, so she has asked her family members - grandmothers and daughters - to write three hundred and sixty-five copies. This way, it will be both devout and clean. Our family, except for Lady Ye, who is busy managing the household and can't write, and Lady Ye, who can't write, even if they could, the rest of the people who can write, regardless of how much they write, have all been given copies. At home, there's no need to say anything else. Lady Xisun nodded and said, "I can't do anything else, but if I have to write a scripture, I have the most confidence in myself. Put down your tea cup." Then, Blue cranes placed the silk bag on the table and sat down with Lady Xisun. The attendant, Cai Ping, brought over a cup of tea."惜春笑着问道：“你写不写？”鸳鸯答道：“姑娘又说笑话了。这些年来还好；这三四年来，姑娘还见我拿了笔写过什么吗？”惜春道：“这样也算是有功德的。”鸳鸯道：“我也有件事：平日侍奉老太太休息后，自己念念米佛，已经念了三年多了。我把这些米收好，等老太太做功德的时候，我将他衬在里头供佛施食，也是我一点诚心。”惜春道：“这样说来，老太太做了观音，你就是龙女了？”鸳鸯道：“那里跟得上这个分儿？却是除了老太太，别的也伏侍不来，不晓得前世什么缘分儿！”说着要走，叫小丫头把小绢包打开，拿出来道：“这素纸一扎，是写《心经》的。又拿起一子儿藏香，道：“这是叫写经时点著写的。
paragraphs.chinese: 鸳鸯提着一个黄绢包儿，向惜春说：“老太太许下九日的功德，现在发心要写三千六百五十零一部《金刚经》。已经外面人写好啦，但俗说《金刚经》就像那道家的符壳，《心经》才是符胆，所以《金刚经》里一定要插上《心经》，更有功德。老太太因为《心经》是更要紧的，观自在又是一位女菩萨，所以要让几个亲丁-奶奶姑娘们-写上三百六十五部。这样，又虔诚，又洁净。我们家里，除了二奶奶-头一宗，他当家没有空儿；二宗，他也写不上来-其余会写字的，不管写多少，连东府珍大奶奶姨娘们都分了去。”"家里头自不用说。"惜春听了，点着头道："别的我做不来，若要写经，我最有信心的。你放下茶碗罢。"鸳鸯才将那小包儿搁在桌上，同惜春坐下。彩屏倒了一锺茶来。惜春笑问道："你写不写？"鸳鸯道："姑娘又说笑话了。那几年还好；这三四年来，姑娘还见我拿了拿笔儿么？"惜春道："这却是有功德的。"鸳鸯道："我也有一件事：向来伏侍老太太安歇后，自己念念米佛，已经念了三年多了。我把这个米收好，等老太太做功德的时候，我将他衬在里头供佛施食，也是我一点诚心。"惜春道："这样说来，老太太做了观音，你就是龙女了？"鸳鸯道："那里跟得上这个分儿？却是除了老太太，别的也伏侍不来，不晓得前世什么缘分儿！"说著要走，叫小丫头把小绢包打开，拿出来道："这素纸一扎，是写《心经》的。"“又拿起一子儿藏香，道：“这是叫写经时点著写的。

paragraphs.original: 惜春都应了，鸳鸯遂辞了出来，同小丫头来至贾母房中，回了一遍，看见贾母与李纨打“双陆”，鸳鸯旁边瞧著。李纨的骰子好，掷下去，把老太太的锤打下了好几个去，鸳鸯抿著嘴儿笑。忽见宝玉进来，手中提了两个细篾丝的小笼子，笼内有几个蝈蝈儿，说道：“我听说老太太夜里睡不著，我给老太太留下解解闷。”贾母笑道：“你别瞅著你老子不在家，你只管淘气。”宝玉笑道：“我没有淘气。”贾母道：“你没淘气，不在学房里念书，为什么又弄这个东西呢？”宝玉道：“不是我自己弄的。前儿因师父叫环儿和兰儿对对子，环儿对不来，我悄悄的告诉了他。他说了，师父喜欢，夸了他两句。他感激我的情，买了来孝敬我的。我才拿了来孝敬老太太的。”贾母道：“他没有天天念书么？为什么对不上来？对不上来，就叫你儒太爷打他的嘴巴子，看他臊不臊！你也够受了。不记得你老子在家时，一叫做诗做词，吓的倒像个小鬼儿似的？这会子又说嘴了。那环儿小子更没出息：求人替做了，就变著方法儿打点人。这么点子孩子就闹鬼闹神的，也不害臊！赶大了，还不知是个什么东西呢！”说的满屋子人都笑了。
paragraphs.english: Ducks and Swans went to see Grandma, who was playing double-six dominoes. He laughed while watching her. When he saw Dons and Swans, he came in and gave her two cages. Grandma rebuked him for not going to school. He said he didn't. Grandma asked why he didn't study, and he said he told the Prince to write couplets. The Prince was happy and gave him some, which he gave to Grandma. Grandma said that the Prince didn't study every day and couldn't think of the right thing, so he should call the schoolmaster to beat him and make him ashamed. She also said that when his father was alive, whenever he made poems or poems, he was scared like a little devil. Now he's just talking. That kid doesn't have any talent: he asks someone to do it and then thinks of ways to reward people. This little kid is already playing tricks, and he's not embarrassed! When he grows up, he won't know what he is!" Grandma said, and everyone in the room laughed.
paragraphs.chinese: 鸳鸯去贾母那里回话，看见贾母在打双陆，鸳鸯笑着看，宝玉看见鸳鸯，进来了，拿两个笼子给贾母，贾母责怪宝玉没上学，宝玉说没有，贾母问宝玉为什么不念书，宝玉说他告诉了贾环对对子，贾环很高兴，送给宝玉，宝玉就送给贾母，贾母说贾环没天天念书。对不上来，就叫你儒太爷打他的嘴巴子，看他臊不臊！你也够受了。不记得你老子在家时，一叫做诗做词，吓的倒像个小鬼儿似的？这会子又说嘴了。那环儿小子更没出息：求人替做了，就变著方法儿打点人。这么点子孩子就闹鬼闹神的，也不害臊！赶大了，还不知是个什么东西呢！”说的满屋子人都笑了。

paragraphs.original: 贾母又问道：“兰小子呢？做上来了没有？这该环儿替他了。他又比他小了，是不是？”宝玉笑道：“他倒没有，却是自己对的。”贾母道：“我不信，不然，就也是你闹了鬼了。如今你还了得，‘羊群里跑出骆驼来了’，就只你大。你又会做文章了。”宝玉笑道：“实在是他作的，师父还夸他明儿一定有大出息呢。老太太不信，就打发人叫了他来，亲自试试，老太太就知道。”贾母道：“果然这么著，我才喜欢。我不过怕你撒谎。既是他做的，这孩子明儿大概还有一点儿出息。”因看著李纨，又想起贾珠来，又说：“这也不枉你大哥哥死了，你大嫂子拉扯他一场！日后也替你大哥哥顶门壮户。”说到这里，不禁泪下。
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

Jia Mother asked, "Where's Laan Xiao? Has he started his work? This should be Rehan's turn. He's younger than him, isn't he?" Bao Yu laughed and said, "He hasn't started yet, but he did his own work." Jia Mother said, "I don't believe it. If not, it must be you playing tricks. Now you're so good at it, 'a camel among sheep,' and you're the biggest. You're also good at writing now." Bao Yu laughed and said, "It's really him who did it, and the teacher praised him for having a bright future. I don't know if the old lady believes it. Let's send someone to call him here, and you can see it for yourself." Jia Mother said, "If that's true, I'll be happy. I was just afraid you were lying. If it's really him, this kid will have a bright future someday." Looking at Li Wang, she also remembered Jia Zhu, and said, "It's not for nothing that your big brother died. Your big sister raised him. In the future, he'll help you with the business." She said this and couldn't help but cry.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母又问：“兰小子呢？做上了没有？这该环儿替他了。他又比他小，是不是？”宝玉笑道：“他倒没有，却是自己对的。”贾母道：“我不信，不然，就也是你闹了鬼了。如今你又了得，‘羊群里跑出骆驼来了’，就只你大。你又会做文章了。”宝玉笑道：“实在是他作的，师父还夸他明儿一定有大出息呢。老太太不信，就打发人叫了他来，亲自试试，老太太就知道。”贾母道：“果然这么著，我才喜欢。我不过怕你撒谎。既是他做的，这孩子明儿大概还有一点儿出息。”因看著李纨，又想起贾珠来，又说：“这也不枉你大哥哥死了，你大嫂子拉扯他一场！日后也替你大哥哥顶门壮户。”说到这里，不禁泪下。

paragraphs.original: 李纨听了这话，却也动心，只是贾母已经伤心，自己连忙忍住泪，笑劝道：“这是老祖宗的馀德，我们托著老祖宗的福罢咧。只要他应的了老祖宗的话，就是我们的造化了。老祖宗看著也喜欢，怎么倒伤起心来呢？”因又回头向宝玉道：“宝叔叔明儿别这么夸他，他多大孩子，知道什么！你不过是爱惜他的意思，他那里懂得？一来二去，眼大心肥，那里还能够有长进呢？”贾母道：“你嫂子这也说的是。就只他还太小呢，也别逼紧了他。小孩子胆儿小，一时逼急了，弄出点子毛病来，书倒念不成，把你的工夫都白糟蹋了。”
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

When Li Wan heard these words, she also felt inclined to do so, but she could not bring herself to do so because it would upset her grandmother. She immediately repressed her tears and said with a smile: "This is the grace of the old patriarch, and we are content to enjoy the grace of the old patriarch. As long as he agrees to the words of the old patriarch, it is our good fortune. The old patriarch will be pleased, why are you feeling sad?" Then she turned to her nephew and said, "Tomorrow, don't praise him so much. He is so young and knows nothing. You just care about him, but he doesn't understand. One day, he will be too bold and will not make any progress." The old patriarch said, "You're right. But he is still too young, don't push him too hard. Children have small hearts, and if you push them too hard, they will make mistakes and your efforts will be wasted."
paragraphs.chinese: 李纨听了这话，心里也动了心，只是贾母已经伤心，她连忙忍住眼泪，笑着说：“这是老祖宗的余德，我们能享受老祖宗的余福就不错了。只要他应了老祖宗的话，就是我们的造化了。老祖宗看着也喜欢，怎么倒伤起心来了呢？”于是又回头对宝玉道：“宝叔叔明儿别这么夸他，他这么小的孩子，又懂什么！你不过是爱惜他的意思，他哪里懂呢？一来二去，他胆子就大了，那里还能够有长进呢？”贾母道：“你嫂子这也说的是。就只他还太小呢，也别逼紧了他。小孩子胆儿小，一时逼急了，弄出点毛病来，书倒念不成，把你的工夫都白糟蹋了。”

paragraphs.original: 贾母说到这里，李纨却忍不住，扑簌簌掉下泪来，连忙擦了。只见贾环贾兰也都进来给贾母请了安。贾兰又见过他母亲，然后过来，在贾母旁边侍立。贾母道：“我刚才听见你叔叔说你对的好对子，师父夸你来著。”贾兰也不言语，只管抿著嘴儿笑。鸳鸯过来说道：“请示老太太，晚饭伺候下了。”贾母道：“请你姨太太去罢。”琥珀接著，便叫人去王夫人那边请薛姨妈。
paragraphs.english: 贾母说到这，李纨忍不住掉下眼泪，擦了。只见贾环和贾兰也过来给贾母请安，贾兰又见过自己的母亲，然后过来，坐在贾母旁边侍立。贾母说：“刚才听见你叔叔说你对得对子，师父夸你呢。”贾兰也不说话，只是抿著嘴儿笑。鸳鸯过来道：“请示老太太，晚饭伺候下了。”贾母说：“叫请姨太太来。”琥珀接着，叫人去请王夫人，请薛姨妈。
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母说到这，李纨忍不住掉下眼泪，马上擦了。只见贾环和贾兰也过来给贾母请安，贾兰又见过自己的母亲，然后过来，坐在贾母旁边侍立。贾母说：“刚才听见你叔叔说你对得对子，师父夸你呢。”贾兰也不说话，只是抿著嘴儿笑。鸳鸯过来道：“请示老太太，晚饭伺候下了。”贾母说：“叫请姨太太来。”琥珀接着，叫人去请王夫人，请薛姨妈。

paragraphs.original: 这里宝玉贾环退出，素云和小丫头过来把“双陆”收起，李纨尚等著伺候贾母的晚饭。贾兰便跟著他母亲站著。贾母道：“你们娘儿两个跟著我吃罢。”李纨答应了。一时，摆上饭来，丫鬟回来禀道：“太太叫回老太太：姨太太这几天浮来暂去，不能过来回老太太，今日饭后家去了。”于是贾母叫贾兰在身旁边坐下，大家吃饭。不必细言。
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

Su Yun and the little maid came over to put away the "double land," and Lady Li Wang was waiting to serve Grandmother's dinner. Jialan followed his mother to stand. Grandmother said, "You two should come and eat with me." Li Wang agreed. Later, the meal was served, and a servant returned to say, "Mrs. Lin called back to Grandmother: Aunt Lin has been coming and going recently, and cannot come to visit Grandmother. She went home after dinner today." So Grandmother asked Jialan to sit by her side, and they all ate.
paragraphs.chinese: 素云和小丫头过来把“双陆”收起，李纨尚等著伺候贾母的晚饭。贾兰便跟著他母亲站著。贾母道：“你们娘儿两个跟著我吃罢。”李纨答应了。一时，摆上饭来，丫鬟回来禀道：“太太叫回老太太：姨太太这几天浮来暂去，不能过来回老太太，今日饭后家去了。”于是贾母叫贾兰在身旁边坐下，大家吃饭。不必细言。

paragraphs.original: 却说贾母刚吃完了饭，盥漱了，歪在床上，说闲话儿。只见小丫头子告诉琥珀，琥珀过来回贾母道：“东府大爷请晚安来了。”贾母道：“你们告诉他：如今他办理家务乏乏的，叫他歇著去罢。我知道了。”小丫头告诉老婆子们，老婆子才告诉贾珍，贾珍然后退出。
paragraphs.english: When the old lady, Mrs. Jia, just finished eating, she washed her face and then sat in a chair, chatting. A little girl came back and told her: "The governor of the East Palace came to bid us goodnight." Mrs. Jia said: "Tell him that he is busy with official duties now, and let him rest. I know." The little girl told the servants, who then told Jia Zhen, and he left.
paragraphs.chinese: 话说贾母刚吃完饭，洗了脸，靠着椅子，闲聊。一个小丫头回来告诉贾母道：“东府老爷来辞晚安了。”贾母道：“你们告诉他：他现在处理公务，让他歇着去吧。我知道了。”小丫头告诉婆婆们，婆婆们又告诉贾珍，贾珍然后退出。

paragraphs.original: 到了次日，贾珍过来料理诸事。门上小厮陆续回了几件事。又一个小厮回道：“庄头送果子来了。”贾珍道：“单子呢？”那小厮连忙呈上。贾珍看时，上面写著不过是时鲜果品，还夹带菜蔬野味若干在内。贾珍看完，问：“向来经管的是谁？”门上的回道：“是周瑞。”便叫周瑞：“照账点清，送往里头交代。等我把来账抄下一个底子，留著好对。”又叫：“告诉厨房，把下菜中添几宗，给送果子的来人，照常赏饭给钱。”
paragraphs.english: The next day, Jia Zhen came over to handle the matter. The doorkeeper reported several things to him. Then a little boy came and reported, "The yardhead sent fruits." Jia Zhen asked, "What's the list?" The little boy hurriedly handed it over. Jia Zhen read it, which only contained fresh fruits, but also included some vegetables and wild animals. Jia Zhen read it and asked, "Who has been in charge of this before?" The doorkeeper replied, "It was Zhou Rui." He called Zhou Rui and asked him to count the things clearly and send them to the inside. He also asked Jia Zhen to copy the account book and keep it for reference. Then he called the kitchen and told them to add a few dishes to the meal for the people who delivered the fruits, and to give them a normal meal and money.
paragraphs.chinese: 第二天，贾珍过来处理事情。门上小厮逐个报告了几件事。又一个小厮来报告道：“庄头送果子来了。”贾珍道：“单子呢？”那小厮连忙递上。贾珍看时，上面写著不过是时鲜果品，还夹带菜蔬野味若干在内。贾珍看完，问：“向来经管的是谁？”门上的回道：“是周瑞。”便叫周瑞：“照账点清，送往里头交代。等我把来账抄下一个底子，留著好对。”又叫：“告诉厨房，把下菜中添几宗，给送果子的来人，照常赏饭给钱。”

paragraphs.original: 周瑞答应了去，一面叫人搬至凤姐儿院子里去，又把庄上的账和果子交代明白出去了。一回儿，又进来回贾珍道：“才刚来的果子，大爷曾点过数目没有？”贾珍道：“我那里有工夫点这个呢？给了你账，你照账点就是了。”周瑞道：“小的曾点过，也没有少，也不能多出来。大爷既留下底子，再叫送果子的人问问他，这账是真的假的。”贾珍道：“这是怎么说？不过是几个果子罢咧，有什么要紧？我又没有疑你。”说著，只见鲍二走来磕了一个头，说道：“求大爷原旧放小的在外头伺候罢。”贾珍道：“你们这又是怎么著？”鲍二道：“奴才在这里又说不上话来。”贾珍道：“谁叫你说话？”鲍二道：“何苦来在这里做眼睛珠儿？”周瑞接口道：“奴才在这里经管地租庄子银钱出入，每年也有三五十万来往，老爷太太奶奶们从没有说过话的，何况这些零星东西？若照鲍二说起来，爷们家里的田地房产都被奴才们弄完了。”贾珍想道：“必是鲍二在这里拌嘴，不如叫他出去。”因向鲍二说道：“快滚罢！”又告诉周瑞说：“你也不用说了，你干你的事罢。”二人各自散了。
paragraphs.english: Zhou Rui agreed to go, and while he called someone to move the fruit to Feng Er's yard, he also settled the farm accounts and fruit delivery details before leaving. After a while, he came back to report to Jia Zhen, saying, "The fruit just arrived has been counted by me, have you checked the number?" Jia Zhen replied, "I don't have the time to count this. Just give me the account and have you verify it according to the account." Zhou Rui said, "I have already counted it, and there is no shortage, nor can there be more. If you keep the bottom copy, ask the fruit delivery person to check if the account is true or false." Jia Zhen said, "What are you saying? These are just a few fruits, what's the big deal? I didn't doubt you." Then, Bao Er came and knelt down to say, "Please let the master release me and let me work outside again." Jia Zhen asked, "What's the matter?" Bao Er replied, "I can't say anything here." Jia Zhen asked, "Why do you want to talk?" Bao Er said, "I'm just making eyes." Zhou Rui chimed in, "As a steward in charge of the farm, I have been responsible for the management of the farm rent and money flow, and there are tens of thousands of yuan involved every year, and the master and mistress have never said a word to me. How could I doubt the master's intention with these trivial items?""If you follow what Bao Er says, all the fields and properties in your home will be stolen by your servants." Jia Zhen thought, "It must be Bao Er arguing here, let's call him out." So he said to Bao Er, "Go away." And he told Zhou Rui, "You don't need to say anything else, just go do your own thing." The two of them went their separate ways.
paragraphs.chinese: 周瑞答应了去，一面叫人搬至凤姐儿院子里去，又把庄上的账和果子交代明白出去了。一回儿，又进来回贾珍道：“才刚来的果子，大爷曾点过数目没有？”贾珍道：“我那里有工夫点这个呢？给了你账，你照账点就是了。”周瑞道：“小的曾点过，也没有少，也不能多出来。大爷既留下底子，再叫送果子的人问问他，这账是真的假的。”贾珍道：“这是怎么说？不过是几个果子罢咧，有什么要紧？我又没有疑你。”说著，只见鲍二走来磕了一个头，说道：“求大爷原旧放小的在外头伺候罢。”贾珍道：“你们这又是怎么著？”鲍二道：“奴才在这里又说不上话来。”贾珍道：“谁叫你说话？”鲍二道：“何苦来在这里做眼睛珠儿？”周瑞接口道：“奴才在这里经管地租庄子银钱出入，每年也有三五十万来往，老爷太太奶奶们从没有说过话的，何况这些零星东西？若是按照鲍二说的，你们家里的田地、房产都被奴才们弄没了。”贾珍想到：“一定是鲍二在这里吵架，不如叫他出去。”于是对鲍二说道：“快滚。”又告诉周瑞说：“你也不用说了，你干你的事去吧。”两个人各自散了。

paragraphs.original: 贾珍正在书房里歇著，听见门上闹的翻江搅海，叫人去查问，回来说道：“鲍二和周瑞的乾儿子打架。”贾珍道：“周瑞的乾儿子是谁？”门上的回道：“他叫何三，本来是个没味儿的，天天在家里吃酒闹事，常来门上坐著。听见鲍二和周瑞拌嘴，他就插在里头。”贾珍道：“这却可恶！把鲍二和那个什么何三给我一块困起来！周瑞呢？”门上的回道：“打架时，他先走了。”贾珍道：“给我拿了来！这还了得了！”众人答应了。
paragraphs.english: Jia Zhen was resting in his study when he heard noisy commotion outside. He asked a servant to find out what was going on. The gatekeeper reported, "It's a fight between Bao Er and Zhou Rui's adopted son." Jia Zhen asked, "Who is Zhou Rui's adopted son?" The gatekeeper replied, "His name is He San, who often drinks and causes trouble at home. He likes to sit around the gatehouse. I heard that Bao Er and Zhou Rui had an argument, and He San got involved." Jia Zhen said, "What a nuisance! Arrest both Bao Er and He San. Where's Zhou Rui?" The gatekeeper said, "He left before the fight started." Jia Zhen replied, "Arrest him too! This is outrageous!"
paragraphs.chinese: 贾珍正在书房里休息，听见门外吵吵闹闹，他叫人去问发生了什么事。门房回来说：“是鲍二和周瑞的干儿子打架。”贾珍问道：“周瑞的干儿子是谁？”门房回答说：“叫何三，经常在家里喝酒闹事，爱在门房里坐坐。今天听说鲍二和周瑞拌嘴，他就插手进去了。”贾珍说：“真可恶，把鲍二和那个叫何三的给我一块儿抓起来。周瑞呢？”门房回说：“打架时，他先走了。”贾珍说：“给我把他抓来！这事还了得！”

paragraphs.original: 正嚷著，贾琏也回来了，贾珍便告诉了一遍。贾琏道：“这还了得！”又添了人去拿周瑞。周瑞知道躲不过，也找到了。贾珍便叫都困上。贾琏便向周瑞道：“你们前头的话也不要紧，大爷说开了很是了，为什么外头又打架？你们打架已经使不得，又弄个野杂种什么何三来闹。你不压伏压伏他们，倒竟走了！”就把周瑞踢了几脚。贾珍道：“单打周瑞不中用。”喝命人把鲍二和何三各人打了五十鞭子，撵了出去，方和贾琏两个商量正事。
paragraphs.english: During the argument, Jialin returned, and Jiazhen told Jialin about the matter. Jialin said, "This is unforgivable!" and then sent someone to find Zhou Wei. Zhou Wei learned about it and came to find them. Jiazhen then ordered them to be locked up. Jialin then told Zhou Wei, "The things you said before were not important. Uncle said it was very good, but why are you fighting outside? You fighting already isn't good, and then you bring a stranger named He San to make trouble. You need to stop them, not just let them go!" He then kicked Zhou Wei a few times. Jiazhen said, "Just beating Zhou Wei isn't enough." He ordered that both Bao Er and He San be each beaten fifty times and then sent away, and then he and Jialin discussed the main issue.
paragraphs.chinese: 正在争吵的时候，贾琏回来了，贾珍便把这事情告诉了贾琏。贾琏听了说：“这还了得！”就又派了人去找周瑞。周瑞知道了，也来找他们。贾珍就叫把他们关起来。贾琏就对着周瑞说：“你们先前说的那些话，也没有什么要紧。大爷说开了，倒很是了，为什么外头又打架？你们打架已经使不得了，又弄一个什么野杂种何三来闹。你不压伏压伏他们，倒竟走了！”就用脚踢了周瑞几脚。贾珍又说：“单打周瑞不中用。”喝令把鲍二和何三各打了五十鞭子，赶了出去，然后同贾琏商量正事。

paragraphs.original: 下人背地里便生出许多议论来：也有说贾珍护短的；也有说不会调停的；也有说他本不是好人，“前儿尤家姊妹弄出许多丑事来，那鲍二不是他调停著二爷叫了来的吗？这会子又嫌鲍二不济事，必是鲍二的女人伏侍不到了。”－－人多嘴杂，纷纷不一。
paragraphs.english: The text translates to: "Some people were discussing Jia Zhuang: Some said he was being protective, some said he was not good at resolving conflicts, some said he was not a good person. Just a few days ago, the You sisters caused a scandal, and Jia Zhuang managed to resolve the matter. Later, he asked Jia Lian to retrieve the person, but now he complains that the woman from Bao Er is not good enough. There are many mouths and tongues, and the rumors spread quickly."
paragraphs.chinese: 有人议论贾珍：有人说是护短；有人说不会调解；有人说他不是好人，前几天尤氏姊妹还闹出丑事，贾珍调停了这事，叫贾琏去要人，这回子又嫌鲍二的女人不行，必定是鲍二的女人不伺候得好。人多嘴杂，议论纷纷。

paragraphs.original: 却说贾政自从在工部掌印，家人中尽有发财的。那贾芸听见了，也要插手弄一点事儿，便在外头说了几个工头，讲了成数，便买了些时新绣货，要走凤姐儿的门子。
paragraphs.english:
Step 1: Identify the main subject and verb
The main subject is "贾政" and the main verb is "掌印", which translates to "take charge".

Step 2: Translate each sentence separately
句子一：话说贾政自从在工部掌印，家中人都是有好处的。
This translates to: "It is said that after taking charge of the Department of Works, the family members of Jia Zheng all benefited."

句子二：贾芸听说，也要做点事，就和几个工头商量，办了几样时新的货色，要走凤姐的门子。
This translates to: "Jia Yun, having heard of this, also wanted to do something and consulted with several foremen, prepared a few new items, and decided to go through the door of the elder sister of the Jade."

Step 3: Combine the translations
By combining the translations of each sentence, we get the following English translation:

"It is said that after taking charge of the Department of Works, the family members of Jia Zheng all benefited. Jia Yun, having heard of this, also wanted to do something and consulted with several foremen, prepared a few new items, and decided to go through the door of the elder sister of the Jade."
paragraphs.chinese: 话说贾政自从在工部掌印，家中人都是有好处的。那贾芸听说，也要做点事，就和几个工头商量，办了几样时新的货色，要走凤姐的门子。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐正在屋里，听见丫头们说：“大爷二爷都生了气，在外头打人呢。”凤姐听了，不知何故。正要叫人去问问，只见贾琏已进来了，把外面的事告诉了一遍。凤姐道：“事情虽不要紧，但这风俗儿断不可长。此刻还算偺们家里正旺的时候儿，他们就敢打架，以后小辈儿们当了家，他们越发难制伏了。前年我在东府里亲眼见过焦大吃的烂醉，躺在台阶子底下骂人，不管上上下下，一混汤子的混骂。他虽是有过功的人，到底主子奴才的名分，也要存点体统儿才好。珍大奶奶－－不是我说－－是个老实头，个个人都叫他养得无法无天的。如今又弄出一个什么鲍二！我还听见是你和珍大爷得用的人，为什么今儿又打他呢？”贾琏听了这话刺心，便讪讪的拿话来支开，借有事，说著就走了。
paragraphs.english: 凤姐在屋里，听见丫头们说：“大爷二爷都生了气，在外头打人呢。”凤姐听了，不知是什么原因。正要叫人去问问，只见贾琏已进来了，把外面的事告诉了一遍。凤姐道：“事情虽不要紧，但这风俗儿断不可长。此刻还算我们家里正旺的时候儿，他们就敢打架，以后小辈儿们当了家，他们越发难制伏了。前年我在东府里亲眼见过焦大吃的烂醉，躺在台阶子底下骂人，不管上上下下，一混汤子的混骂。他虽是有过功的人，到底主子奴才的名分，也要存点体统儿才好。珍大奶奶—一不是我说—一是个老实头，个个人都叫他养得无法无天的。如今又弄出一个什么鲍二！我还听见是你和珍大爷得用的人，为什么今儿又打他呢？”贾琏听了这话刺心，便讪讪的拿话来支开，借有事，说著就走了。
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐在屋里，听见丫头们说：“大爷二爷都生了气，在外头打人呢。”凤姐听了，不知是什么原因。正要叫人去问问，只见贾琏已进来了，把外面的事告诉了一遍。凤姐道：“事情虽不要紧，但这风俗儿断不可长。此刻还算我们家里正旺的时候儿，他们就敢打架，以后小辈儿们当了家，他们越发难制伏了。前年我在东府里亲眼见过焦大吃的烂醉，躺在台阶子底下骂人，不管上上下下，一混汤子的混骂。他虽是有过功的人，到底主子奴才的名分，也要存点体统儿才好。珍大奶奶—一不是我说—一是个老实头，个个人都叫他养得无法无天的。如今又弄出一个什么鲍二！我还听见是你和珍大爷得用的人，为什么今儿又打他呢？”贾琏听了这话刺心，便讪讪的拿话来支开，借有事，说著就走了。

paragraphs.original: 小红进来回道：“芸二爷在外头要见奶奶。”凤姐一想：“他又来做什么？”便道：“叫他进来罢。”
paragraphs.english:
"Xiao Hong came in and said, 'Yun Er, the second son, wants to see Grandma.' " The countess Fong thought, "What does he want?" and said, "Let him come in."

Step 1: Identify the main subjects, objects, and verbs in the sentence.
- 主语: 小红 (Xiao Hong)
- 谓语: 回道 (said)
- 宾语: "芸二爷在外头要见奶奶" (Yun Er, the second son, wants to see Grandma)

Step 2: Translate the main subjects, objects, and verbs into English.
- 主语: Xiao Hong
- 谓语: said
- 宾语: "Yun Er, the second son, wants to see Grandma"

Step 3: Identify any additional information in the sentence.
- The countess Fong thinks about Yun Er's intention
- The countess Fong decides to let Yun Er come in

Step 4: Translate any additional information into English.
- The countess Fong thinks: "What does he want?"
- The countess Fong decides: "Let him come in"

Step 5: Combine the translated subjects, objects, verbs, and additional information to form a coherent English sentence.

Xiao Hong came in and said, "Yun Er, the second son, wants to see Grandma." The countess Fong thought, "What does he want?" and said, "Let him come in."
paragraphs.chinese: 小红进来回道：“芸二爷在外头要见奶奶。”凤姐一想：“他又来做什么？”便道：“叫他进来罢。”

paragraphs.original: 小红出来，瞅著贾芸微微一笑。贾芸赶忙凑近一步，问道：“姑娘替我回了没有？”小红红了脸，说道：“我就是见二爷的事多！”贾芸道：“何曾有多少事能到里头来劳动姑娘呢？就是那一年姑娘在宝二叔房里，我才和姑娘－－”小红怕人撞见，不等说完，连忙问道：“那年我换给二爷的一块绢子，二爷见了没有？”
paragraphs.english:
Little Red came out and looked at Jia Yun with a gentle smile. Jia Yun quickly approached a step closer and asked, "Are you sending a message for me?" Little Red turned red and said, "I see how busy you are!" Jia Yun said, "Where could you find many things to do inside? That year when I was in Master Jia's room, I only talked to you..." Little Red was afraid that someone would see them, so she stopped speaking. She asked, "Did you see the silk I gave you that year?"

Calculate the area of a triangle using trigonometry, given that the base (a) is 6 units and the angle between the base and the height is 45 degrees.

Area = (1/2) * a * h

where h is the height of the triangle. Since the angle between the base and the height is 45 degrees, we can use the sine function to find the height:

sin(45) = h / a
h = a * sin(45) = 6 * sin(45) = 6 * (√2/2) = 3√2

Therefore, the area of the triangle is:

Area = (1/2) * 6 * 3√2 = 9√2 square units

If {eq}\displaystyle \sin \theta = \frac {3}{5}, \pi < \theta < \frac {3 \pi}{2}

{/eq}, find the value of {eq}\displaystyle \cos \theta

{/eq}.

We are given the value of {eq}\sin \theta = \frac{3}{5}

{/eq}, with {eq}\pi < \theta < \frac {3 \pi}{2}

{/eq}. This indicates that {eq}\theta

{/eq} is in quadrant III.

In quadrant III, both {eq}\sin \theta

{/eq} and {eq}\cos \theta

{/eq} are negative.

Using the Pythagorean identity {eq}\sin^2 \theta + \cos^2 \theta = 1

{/eq}, we can find the value of {eq}\cos \theta

{/eq}:

$$\begin{align}

\cos^2 \theta &= 1 - \sin^2 \theta \\[0.2 cm]

&= 1 - \left(\frac{3}{5}\right)^2 \\[0.2 cm]

&= 1 - \frac{9}{25} \\[0.2 cm]

&= \frac{16}{25} \\[0.2 cm]

\cos \theta &= - \sqrt{\frac{16}{25}} \\[0.2 cm]

\cos \theta &= - \frac{4}{5}

\end{align}

$$

Therefore, the value of {eq}\cos \theta

{/eq} is {eq}\boxed{- \frac{4}{5}}

{/eq}.

Find the equation of the plane passing through the points $\left(-\frac{3}{2},-1,-\frac{3}{2}\right)$, $\left(\frac{9}{2},\frac{3}{2},-\frac{9}{2}\right)$, and $\left(\frac{9}{2},-2,-3\right)$.

To find the equation of the plane, we can use the following steps:

1. Find two vectors that lie in the plane. We can do this by subtracting the coordinates of two of the points:

$$\overrightarrow{v_1} = \left(\frac{9}{2},\frac{3}{2},-\frac{9}{2}\right) - \left(-\frac{3}{2},-1,-\frac{3}{2}\right) = (6,4,-3)$$

$$\overrightarrow{v_2} = \left(\frac{9}{2},-2,-3\right) - \left(-\frac{3}{2},-1,-\frac{3}{2}\right) = (6,-1,-3)$$

2. Find the cross product of the two vectors:

$$\overrightarrow{v_1} \times \overrightarrow{v_2} = \begin{vmatrix} \hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\\ 6 & 4 & -3 \\\ 6 & -1 & -3 \end{vmatrix}$$

$$= (4\cdot(-3) - (-3)\cdot(-1))\hat{i} - (6\cdot(-3) - (-3)\cdot6)\hat{j} + (6\cdot(-1) - 4\cdot6)\hat{k}$$

$$= -15\hat{i} + 18\hat{j} - 24\hat{k}$$

3. The cross product is a vector that is perpendicular to both $\overrightarrow{v_1}$ and $\overrightarrow{v_2}$, and therefore perpendicular to the plane. So, the equation of the plane can be written as:

$$-15x + 18y - 24z = d$$

4. To find the value of $d$, we can substitute the coordinates of one of the points into the equation:

$$-15\left(-\frac{3}{2}\right) + 18(-1) - 24\left(-\frac{3}{2}\right) = d$$

$$\frac{45}{2} - 18 + 36 = d$$

$$d = 27$$

5. Therefore, the equation of the plane is:

$$-15x + 18y - 24z = 27$$

$$15x - 18y + 24z + 27 = 0$$
####
The answer is $15x - 18y + 24z + 27 = 0$

A company has sales of $500,000 and a gross margin of 40%. If the company's operating expenses are 15% of sales, what is its net income?

Gross margin = Sales - Cost of goods sold
40% = $500,000 - Cost of goods sold
Cost of goods sold = $300,000

Operating expenses = 15% of sales = 0.15 * $500,000 = $75,000

Net income = Gross margin - Operating expenses
Net income = $200,000 - $75,000
Net income = $125,000
paragraphs.chinese: 小红出来，看着贾芸微微一笑。贾芸赶快凑近一步，问道：“姑娘替我回没有？”小红脸红了，说道：“我就是见二爷的事多！”贾芸道：“哪里有多少事能到里头来劳动姑娘呢？就是那一年姑娘在宝二叔房里，我才和姑娘－－”小红怕人撞见，不等说完，连忙问道：“那年我换给二爷的一块绢子，二爷见了没有？”

paragraphs.original: 那贾芸听了这句话，喜的心花俱开，才要说话，只见一个小丫头从里面出来，贾芸连忙同著小红往里走。两个人一左一右，相离不远。贾芸悄悄的道：“回来我出来，还是你送出我来。我告诉你，还有笑话儿呢。”小红听了，把脸飞红，瞅了贾芸一眼，也不答言。和他到了凤姐门口，自己先进去回了，然后出来，掀起帘子，点手儿，口中却故意说道：“奶奶请芸二爷进来呢。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Yun heard these words and was overjoyed, smiling with his heart. As he was about to speak, a little maid came out of the room, and Jia Yun hurriedly walked into the room with Little Hong. The two of them were standing on opposite sides, not very far apart. Jia Yun whispered, "Wait for me to come out, and then I'll send you out. I'll tell you a funny story." Little Hong listened to these words, turned red, and looked at Jia Yun without saying a word. When they arrived at Lady Feng's room, Little Hong went in first to report, and then came out, lifting the curtain and pointing at Jia Yun, "Grandma is calling you in."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾芸听了这话，喜的心花怒放，正想说话，只见一个小丫头从里头出来，贾芸连忙同小红走进去。两个人一左一右，相离不远。贾芸偷偷地说：“等我出来，你送我出来。我告诉你一个笑话儿。”小红听了这话，脸红了，看着贾芸，也不说话。到了凤姐屋里，小红先进去回话，然后出来，把帘子掀起来，用手点着贾芸说：“奶奶叫你进去呢。”

paragraphs.original: 贾芸笑了一笑，跟著他走进房来，见了凤姐儿，请了安，并说母亲叫问好。凤姐也问了他母亲好。凤姐道：“你来有什么事？”贾芸道：“侄儿从前承婶娘疼爱，心上时刻想著，总过意不去。欲要孝敬婶娘，又怕婶娘多想。如今重阳时候，略备了一点儿东西。婶娘这里那一件没有呢？不过是侄儿一点孝心。只怕婶娘不赏脸。”凤姐儿笑道：“有话坐下说。”贾芸才侧身坐了，连忙将东西捧著搁在旁边桌上。凤姐又道：“你不是什么有馀的人，何苦又去花钱？我又不等著使。你今儿来意是怎么个想头儿，你倒是实说。”贾芸道：“并没有别的想头儿，不过感念婶娘的恩惠过意不去罢咧。”说著，微微的笑了。凤姐道：“不是这么说。你手里窄，我很知道，我何苦白白儿使你的？你要我收下这东西，须先和我说明白了。要是这么‘含著骨头露著肉’的，我倒不收。”
paragraphs.english:
Jia Yun smiled and followed him into the room. Upon meeting with the Lady Feng, he bowed to her and enquired after her mother's health. Lady Feng also enquired after her mother's health. Lady Feng then asked, "What brings you here?" Jia Yun replied, "I have been blessed with your care and love, and I am constantly in your debt. I wanted to show my gratitude, but I feared that you would think ill of me. Today is the day of the Chongyang Festival, and I have brought a small gift to express my gratitude. Although you have everything you need, this is my way of showing my respect. I hope you will accept it." Lady Feng laughed and said, "Please sit down and tell me what you have in mind." Jia Yun sat down beside her and placed the gift on the table. Lady Feng then said, "You are not a wealthy person, and I understand that. I would not make you spend money for nothing. What is your intention today?" Jia Yun said, "I have no other intention except to express my gratitude for your kindness." He smiled. Lady Feng said, "You should be more straightforward. You are in a tight financial situation, and I am aware of that. I am not the one who would use your generosity. Please tell me your true thoughts." Jia Yun said, "I am grateful for your kindness, and I hope that you will accept my small token of gratitude."To translate the given Chinese text to English, I will follow these steps:

1. Break down the sentence into smaller segments.
2. Identify the subject, verb, and objects.
3. Translate each segment into English.
4. Combine the translated segments into a coherent sentence.

Here's the step-by-step translation:

1. 我要你收下这东西
2. 须先和我说明白了
3. 要是这么‘含着骨头露着肉’的
4. 我倒不收

Translated segments:

1. I want you to take this thing
2. Must first explain to me
3. If it's like 'having bones and showing meat'
4. I won't take it

Combining the translated segments into a coherent English sentence:

"I want you to take this thing, but first you must explain to me. If it's like 'having bones and showing meat', I won't take it."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾芸笑了笑，跟着他走进房来，见到凤姐儿，向她请了安，并向她询问母亲的近况。凤姐也问了她母亲的近况。凤姐道：“你来有什么事？”贾芸道：“侄儿从前承蒙婶娘疼爱，心里时刻想念，总过意不去。想要孝敬婶娘，又怕婶娘多想。如今重阳时候，略备了一点儿东西。婶娘这里那一件没有呢？不过是侄儿一点孝心。只怕婶娘不赏脸。”凤姐儿笑道：“有话坐下说。”贾芸才侧身坐了，连忙将东西捧著搁在旁边桌上。凤姐又道：“你不是什么有馀的人，何苦又去花钱？我又不等著使。你今儿来意是怎么个想头儿，你倒是实说。”贾芸道：“并没有别的想头儿，不过感念婶娘的恩惠过意不去罢咧。”说著，微微的笑了。凤姐道：“不是这么说。你手里窄，我很知道，我何苦白白儿使你的？我要你收下这东西，须先和我说明白了。要是这么‘含着骨头露着肉’的，我倒不收。”

paragraphs.original: 贾芸没法儿，只得站起来，陪著笑儿说道：“并不是有什么妄想，前几日听见老爷总办陵工，侄儿有几个朋友办过好些工程，极妥当的，要求婶娘在老爷跟前提一提。办得一两种，侄儿再忘不了婶娘的恩典！若是家里用得著侄儿，也能给婶娘出力。”凤姐道：“若是别的，我却可以作主。至于衙门里的事，上头呢，都是堂官司员定的；底下呢，都是那些书办衙役们办的。别人只怕插不上手，连自己的家人也不过跟著老爷伏侍伏侍。就是你二叔去，亦只是为的是各自家里的事，他也并不能搀越公事。论家事，这里是踩一头儿撬一头儿的，连珍大爷还弹压不住。你的年纪儿又轻，辈数儿又小，那里缠的清这些人呢？况且衙门里头的事差不多儿也要完了，不过吃饭瞎跑。你在家里什么事作不得，难道没了这碗饭吃不成？我这是实在话，你自己回去想想就知道了。你的情意，我已经领了，把东西快拿回去，是那里弄来的，仍旧给人家送了去罢。”
paragraphs.english:
Jia Yun had no choice but to stand up and smile awkwardly, saying, "I didn't have any fanciful thoughts. A few days ago, I heard that the old man was in charge of the tomb work. I have a few friends who have done some engineering projects, which are very well done. Could you please mention it to my aunt? If I can do one or two, I will never forget your kindness! If your family needs my help, I will do my best to help." The Queen said, "As for other things, I can decide. But as for the affairs of the court, the higher-ups decide the matters, and the lower-ups handle the details. It's hard for anyone else to get involved, not to mention your own family servants. Even if your uncle goes, he can only handle his own family affairs. Your age is young, and you are a junior. How can you handle these people? Plus, the work in the court is almost done, and it's just about eating and running around. You can do something at home. Why would you not have food to eat?"English translation:

"I'm telling the truth. Just go back and think about it, and you'll know that I already received your gift. I want you to take it back, and I don't know where you got it, so you should return it to the person."

paragraphs.chinese: 贾芸没有办法，只好站起来，陪着笑说：“并不是有什麽妄想，前几日听见老爷总办陵工，小侄儿有几个朋友办过些工程，极妥当的，要求婶娘在老爷跟前提一提。办得一两种，小侄儿再忘不了婶娘的恩典！若是家里用得着小侄儿，也能给婶娘出力。”凤姐说：“若是别的，我却可以作主。至于衙门里的事，上面呢，都是堂官司员定的；下面呢，都是那些书办衙役们办的。别人只怕插不上手，连自己的家人也不过跟着老爷侍候侍候。就是你二叔去，亦只是为的是各自家里的事，他也并不能搀越公事。论家事，这里是踩一头儿撬一头儿的，连珍大爷还压不住。你的年纪儿又轻，辈数儿又小，那里缠得清这些人呢？况且衙门里头的事差不多儿也要完了，不过吃饭瞎跑。你在家里什么事作不得，难道没了这碗饭吃不成？我说的是真话，你自己回去想想就知道了，你的礼，我已经领了，东西还是拿回去，那是从哪里弄来的，再给人家送回去。

paragraphs.original: 正说著，只见奶妈子一大起带了巧姐儿进来。那巧姐儿身上穿得锦团花簇，手里拿著好些玩意儿，笑嘻嘻走到凤姐身边学舌。贾芸一见，便站起来，笑盈盈的赶著说道：“这就是大妹妹么？－－你要什么好东西不要？”那巧姐儿便哑的一声哭了。贾芸连忙退下。凤姐道：“乖乖不怕。”连忙将巧姐揽在怀里，道：“这是你芸大哥哥，怎么认起生来了？”贾芸道：“妹妹生得好相貌，将来又是个有大造化的。”那巧姐儿回头把贾芸一瞧，又哭起来，叠连几次。
paragraphs.english:
Milk mother brings Qiaoji, Qiaoji wears elaborate clothing, holds toys, laughs and imitates speech. Jia Yun sees Qiaoji, laughs and calls each other brother and sister. Qiaoji is timid, Jia Yun retreats, and the old lady embraces her. Jia Yun praises Qiaoji, and Qiaoji cries.

How to study for a math test?

Studying for a math test requires a systematic approach and consistent practice. Here is a step-by-step guide to help you prepare effectively:

1. Review the course material: Start by reviewing your class notes, textbooks, and any other relevant materials. Make sure you understand the key concepts and principles covered in the course.

2. Identify your strengths and weaknesses: Assess your understanding of the material and identify any areas where you may need additional practice. Focus on these areas and seek help if necessary.

3. Create a study plan: Break down your study time into manageable chunks and create a study schedule. Set specific goals for each study session and prioritize the topics that need the most attention.

4. Practice, practice, practice: Math is a subject that requires a lot of practice. Work through as many problems as you can, starting with the basics and gradually moving on to more complex problems. This will help you build your skills and confidence.

5. Use resources: Take advantage of additional resources such as textbooks, online tutorials, and practice tests. These can provide additional explanations and practice problems that may help you understand the material better.

6. Get help when needed: If you are struggling with a particular concept or problem, don't hesitate to seek help. Ask your teacher for extra help, join a study group, or hire a tutor.

7. Stay organized: Keep your study materials organized and in one place. This will help you find what you need quickly and efficiently.

8. Take breaks: It's important to take breaks during your study sessions to avoid burnout. Take short breaks every hour or so to stretch, walk around, or do something else that you enjoy.

9. Review regularly: Regularly review the material you have learned to reinforce your understanding and ensure that you don't forget important concepts.

10. Stay positive: Finally, stay positive and believe in yourself. Math can be challenging, but with consistent effort and practice, you can achieve success on your math test.

paragraphs.chinese: 奶妈带巧姐来，巧姐穿锦簇，拿玩具，笑学舌，贾芸见巧姐，笑称兄道弟，巧姐胆怯，贾芸退，凤姐揽入怀，贾芸夸巧姐，巧姐哭。

paragraphs.original: 贾芸看这光景坐不住，便起身告辞要走。凤姐道：“你把东西带了去罢。”贾芸道：“这一点子，婶娘还不赏脸？”凤姐道：“你不带去，我便叫人送到你家去。芸哥儿，你不要这么著。你又不是外人。我这里有机会，少不得打发人去叫你；没有事也没法儿，不在乎这些东东西西上的。”贾芸看见凤姐执意不受，只得红著脸道：“既这么著，我再找得用的东西来孝敬婶娘罢。”凤姐儿便叫小红：“拿了东西，跟著送出芸哥去。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Yun saw that Lady Feng insisted on not accepting it, so he blushed and said, "Well, since that's the case, I'll find something else to present to Aunt Feng." Lady Feng then called Xiaohong, "Take the things and send Jia Yun out."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾芸见凤姐执意不受，只得红著脸说：“既然这样，我再找些别的东西孝敬婶娘罢。”凤姐儿便叫小红：“拿了东西，跟著送出芸哥去。”

paragraphs.original: 贾芸走著，一面心中想道：“人说二奶奶利害，果然利害。一点儿都不漏缝，真正斩钉截铁！怪不得没有后世。这巧姐儿更怪，见了我好像前世的冤家似的。真正晦气，白闹了这么一天！”
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

Jia Yun walked while thinking to himself, "They say that Madam Li is difficult to deal with, and indeed she is. Not a single crack is let through, truly decisive! That's why there are no descendants. This Jia Qiao is even more peculiar, treating me as if I were an old enemy from the past. Truly bad luck, for all that effort was for nothing!"

Breakdown:

1. "贾芸边走边想" (Jia Yun walked while thinking) - This phrase is an example of a common idiomatic expression in Chinese, which means that someone is both physically moving and mentally occupied at the same time.

2. "人说二奶奶厉害，果然厉害。" (They say that Madam Li is difficult to deal with, and indeed she is.) - This sentence is an example of a rhetorical question in Chinese, where the speaker asks a question that they already know the answer to. Here, Jia Yun is acknowledging the reputation of Madam Li as being difficult to deal with.

3. "一点儿都不漏风，真正斩钉截铁！" (Not a single crack is let through, truly decisive!) - This phrase emphasizes that Madam Li is very strict and does not allow any loopholes.

4. "怪不得没有后世。" (That's why there are no descendants.) - This sentence is a commentary on the reputation of Madam Li, suggesting that her strictness and lack of compassion have resulted in her having no descendants.

5. "这巧姐儿更怪，见了我好像前世的冤家似的。" (This Jia Qiao is even more peculiar, treating me as if I were an old enemy from the past.) - This sentence is a commentary on Jia Qiao's behavior towards Jia Yun, implying that she is acting out of some sort of hostility or enmity towards him.

6. "真正晦气，白闹了一天！" (Truly bad luck, for all that effort was for nothing!) - This phrase expresses Jia Yun's disappointment and frustration with the situation, indicating that he has put in a lot of effort for something that has ultimately failed to produce any positive results.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾芸边走边想：“人说二奶奶厉害，果然厉害。一点儿都不漏风，真正斩钉截铁！怪不得没有后世。这巧姐儿更怪，见了我好像前世的冤家似的。真正晦气，白闹了一天！”

paragraphs.original: 小红见贾芸没得彩头，也不高兴，拿著东西跟出来。贾芸接过来，打开包儿，拣了两件，悄悄的递给小红。小红不接，嘴里说道：“二爷别这么著。看奶奶知道了，大家倒不好看。”贾芸道：“你好生收著罢。怕什么？那里就知道了呢？你若不要，就是瞧不起我了。”小红微微一笑，才接过来，说道：“谁要你这些东西？算什么呢？”说了这句话，把脸又飞红了。贾芸也笑道：“我也不是为东西。况且那东西也算不了什么。”
paragraphs.english: 小红看到贾芸没有得到好彩头，不开心了，拿着东西跟了出来。贾芸接过东西来，打开包裹，选了两件，悄悄地递给小红。小红不要，嘴里说：“二爷别这样。看奶奶知道了，大家都不好。”贾芸说：“你好好收着吧。怕什么？谁会知道呢？你要是不要，就是看不起我了。”小红微微一笑，才接过来，说道：“谁要你这些东西？算什么呢？”说完这句话，脸又红了。贾芸也笑着说：“我也不是为了东西。况且那东西也算不了什么。”
paragraphs.chinese: 小红见贾芸没得彩头，不高兴了，拿着东西跟了出来。贾芸接过东西来，打开包，拣了两件，悄悄递给小红。小红不要，嘴里说道：“二爷别这样。看奶奶知道了，大家不好看。”贾芸道：“你好好收著罢。怕什么？那里就知道了呢？你若不要，就是瞧不起我了。”小红微微一笑，才接过来，说道：“谁要你这些东西？算什么呢？”说了这句话，脸又红了。贾芸也笑道：“我也不是为东西。况且那东西也算不了什么。”

paragraphs.original: 说著话儿，两个已走到二门口。贾芸把下剩的仍旧揣在怀内。小红催著贾芸道：“你先去罢。有什么事情，只管来找我。我如今在这院里了，又不隔手。”贾芸点点头儿，说道：“二奶奶太利害，我可惜不能常来！刚才我说的话，你横竖心里明白，得了空儿再告诉你罢。”小红满脸羞红，说道：“你去罢。明儿也常来走走。谁叫你和他生疏呢？”贾芸道：“知道了。”贾芸说著，出了院门。这里小红站在门口，怔怔的看他去远了，才回来了。

Final translation:

The two of them reached the second entrance, and Jia Yun put the remaining things in his arms. Xiao Hong urged Jia Yun to go first and said, "You go ahead. If you have anything to tell me, just come to the courtyard without any delay." Jia Yun nodded and said, "Madam is too strict, I'm afraid I can't come often. The things I said just now, do you understand? I'll tell you another time." Xiao Hong turned red and said, "Go ahead. Come visit more often. You and him are too distant." Jia Yun said, "I know." Jia Yun said, and then left the courtyard. Xiao Hong stood at the door, watching Jia Yun walk away, before finally returning to her room.
paragraphs.chinese: 两人走到二门口，贾芸把剩下的东西放进怀中。小红催促贾芸道：“你先走吧。你有什么事情，随时来找我，我在院子里，不用隔手。”贾芸点头，说道：“二奶奶太厉害，我恐怕不能常来，刚才我说的话，你可明白，有空再告诉你吧。”小红满脸通红，说道：“你去吧。明儿也常来走走，你和他太生疏了。”贾芸道：“知道了。”贾芸说著，出了院门。小红站在门口，呆呆地看着贾芸走远了，才回屋。

paragraphs.original: 却说凤姐在屋里吩咐预备晚饭，因又问道：“你们熬了粥了没有？”丫鬟们连忙去问，回来回道：“预备了。”凤姐道：“你们把那南边来的糟东西弄一两碟来罢。”秋桐答应了，叫丫头们伺候。平儿走来笑道：“我倒忘了：今儿晌午，奶奶在上头老太太那边的时候，水月庵的师父打发人来，要向奶奶讨两瓶南小菜，还要支用几个月的月钱，说是身上不受用。我问那道婆来著：‘师父怎么不受用？’他说：‘四五天了。前儿夜里，因那些小沙弥小道士里头有几个女孩子，睡觉没有吹灯，他说了几次，不听。那一夜，看见他们三更以后灯还点著呢，他便叫他们吹灯，个个都睡著了，没有人答应，只得自己亲自起来给他们吹灭了。回到炕上，只见有两个人，一男一女，坐在炕上。他赶著问是谁，那里把一根绳子往他脖子上一套，他便叫起人来。众人听见，点上灯火，一齐赶来，已经躺在地下，满口吐白沫子。幸亏救醒了。此时还不能吃东西，所以叫来寻些小菜儿的。’我因奶奶不在屋里不便给他。我说：‘奶奶此时没有空儿，在上头呢，回来告诉。’便打发他回去了。刚才听见说起南菜，方想起来了；不然，就忘了。”
paragraphs.english:
凤姐吩咐准备晚饭，又问：“熬粥没有？”丫鬟们连忙去问，回来说已经预备了。凤姐道：“你们把那南方来的糟东西弄一碟来罢。”秋桐答应了，叫丫头们伺候。平儿走来说：“我倒忘了：今天晌午，奶奶在上头老太太那里，水月庵的师父打发人来，要向奶奶讨两瓶南小菜，还要支用几个月的月钱，说是身上不舒服。我问那道婆来，师父怎么不舒服？他说：四五天了。前天夜里，因为那些小沙弥小道士里头有几个女孩子，睡觉没有吹灯，他说了好几次，不听。那一夜，看见他们三更以后灯还点著呢，他便叫他们吹灯，个个都睡著了，没有人答应，只得自己亲自起来给他们吹灭了。回到炕上，只见有两个人，一男一女，坐在炕上。他赶著问是谁，那里把一根绳子往他脖子上一套，他便叫起人来。

凤姐吩咐准备晚饭，丫鬟们立刻去问，回复说已经预备好了。凤姐道：“你们把南方的糟食弄一碟来。”秋桐答应了，让丫头们伺候。平儿走来说：“我忘了：今天中午，奶奶在老太太那里，水月庵的师父派人来，要向奶奶讨两瓶南菜，还要支用几个月的月钱，说是因为身体不舒服。我问那个道婆来，师父怎么不舒服？他说：四五天了。前天夜里，因为那些小沙弥小道士里有几个女孩子，睡觉没有吹灯，他说了好几次，不听。那一夜，看见他们三更以后灯还点著呢，他便叫他们吹灯，个个都睡著了，没有人答应，只得自己亲自起来给他们吹灭了。回到炕上，只见有两个人，一男一女，坐在炕上。他赶著问是谁，那里把一根绳子往他脖子上一套，他便叫起人来。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐听了，呆了一呆，说道：“南菜不是还有呢，叫人送些去就是了。那银子，过一天叫芹哥来领就是了。”又见小红进来回道：“刚才二爷差人来说是今晚城外有事，不能回来，先通知一声。”凤姐道：“是了。”
paragraphs.english: 凤姐听了，呆了一呆，说道：“南方的菜不是还有吗，叫人送去就可以了。那银子，过一天让芹哥来领就可以了。”又见小红进来回道：“刚才二爷派了人来说今晚城外有事，不能回来，先通知一声。”凤姐道：“知道了。”
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐听了，呆了一呆，说道：“南菜不是还有呢，叫人送些去就是了。那银子，过一天叫芹哥来领就是了。”又见小红进来回道：“刚才二爷差人来说是今晚城外有事，不能回来，先通知一声。”凤姐道：“是了。”

paragraphs.original: 说著，只听见小丫头从后面喘吁吁的嚷著，直跑到院子里来。外面平儿接著，还有几个丫头们，咕咕唧唧的说话。凤姐道：“你们说什么呢？”平儿道：“小丫头子有些胆怯，说鬼话。”凤姐叫那一个小丫头进来问道：“什么鬼话？”那丫头道：“我刚才到后边去叫打杂儿的添煤，只听得三间空屋子里哗喇哗喇的响，我还道是猫儿耗子；又听得‘嗳’的一声，像个人出气儿的似的。我害怕，就跑回来了。”凤姐骂道：“胡说！我这里断不兴说神说鬼。我从来不信这些个话，快滚出去罢！”
paragraphs.english:
Translating the given Chinese text to English:

"I'm talking," said, only heard the little maid out of breath, shouting from behind, directly running into the courtyard. Outside, Ping'er followed, and there were a few other maids, whispering to each other. The wife said, "What are you whispering about?" Ping'er said, "The little maid was a bit scared and was talking about ghosts." The wife called the little maid in and asked, "What did you say about ghosts?" The maid said, "I was just going to the back to tell the one who adds coal to go, and I heard the sound of the empty room, the sound of a cat or a mouse. Then I heard a 'hmm' sound, like a person breathing. I was scared and came back." The wife scolded, "Hush! I don't believe in talking about ghosts here. I've never believed in these things. Get out!"

Please translate the following Chinese text into English:

我到美国学习钢琴，那里的教授说，中国人很聪明，但我认为这个“聪明”是与世界范围相比较的，中国学生绝不是每个都聪明的，也不是每件事都能做得好。我身边也有许多非常聪明，学的东西非常多，非常全面，甚至钢琴以外的音乐也很精通的。他们就是由于能力太强，而缺乏一种精神，我认为这种精神是最重要的。

I went to the United States to study the piano. There, the professors said that Chinese people are very smart. However, I think this "smart" is in comparison with the world, and Chinese students are not all smart, nor can they do everything well. There are also many people around me who are very smart, learning a lot of things, very comprehensive, even the music outside the piano is very proficient. They are due to their strong ability, and lack of a certain kind of spirit, which I think is the most important.

paragraphs.chinese: 说著，只听见小丫头从后面喘吁吁的嚷著，直跑到院子里来。外面平儿接著，还有几个丫头们，咕咕唧唧的说话。凤姐道：“你们说什么呢？”平儿道：“小丫头子有些胆怯，说鬼话。”凤姐叫那一个小丫头进来问道：“什么鬼话？”那丫头道：“我刚才到后边去叫打杂儿的添煤，只听得三间空屋子里哗喇哗喇的响，我还道是猫儿耗子；又听得‘嗳’的一声，像个人出气儿的似的。我害怕，就跑回来了。”凤姐骂道：“胡说！我这里断不兴说神说鬼。我从来不信这些个话，快滚出去罢！”

paragraphs.original: 那小丫头出去了。凤姐便叫彩明将一天零碎日用账对过一遍。时已将近二更，大家又歇了一回，略说些闲话，遂叫各人安歇去罢。凤姐也睡下了。将近三更，凤姐似睡不睡，觉得身上寒毛一乍，自己惊醒了，越躺著越发起渗来，因叫平儿秋桐过来作伴。二人也不解何意。那秋桐本来不顺凤姐，后来贾琏因尤二姐之事，不大爱惜他了，凤姐又笼络他，如今倒也安静，只是心里比平儿差多了，外面情儿。今见凤姐不受用，只得端上茶来。凤姐喝了一口道：“难为你，睡去罢，只留下平儿在这里就够了。”秋桐却要献勤儿，因说道：“奶奶睡不著，倒是我们两个轮流坐坐也使得。”凤姐一面说，一面睡著了。平儿秋桐看见凤姐已睡，只听得远远的鸡声叫了，二人方都穿著衣裳略躺了一躺，就天亮了，连忙起来伏侍凤姐梳洗。
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

Ping'er and Qiu Tong came over to accompany Mrs. Feng, but she didn't listen to Qiu Tong's words. Qiu Tong sat for a while and then went back to sleep. When it was bright, Mrs. Feng finished her grooming, and Ping'er and Qiu Tong left, each going to rest.
paragraphs.chinese: 平儿和秋桐过来陪凤姐，她不听秋桐的话，秋桐坐了一会子就回去睡觉了。天亮时，凤姐梳洗完了，平儿和秋桐就退下，各自回去休息。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐因夜中之事，心神恍惚不宁，只是一味要强，仍然扎挣起来。正坐著纳闷，忽听个小丫头子在院里问道：“平姑娘在屋里么？”平儿答应了一声。那小丫头掀起帘子进来，却是王夫人打发过来来找贾琏，说：“外头有人回要紧的官事。老爷才出了门，太太叫快请二爷过去呢。”凤姐听见，吓了一跳。
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

Feng Jie, due to the night's events, was in a state of restlessness and uneasiness, but she still managed to get up. She sat there pondering, but suddenly heard a small maid asking, "Is Ping'er in the room?" Ping'er answered. The maid then came in through the curtain, it was Wang Fu, who had come to find Jia Lian, saying, "There is an important official matter to report. Father left just now, and Mother asked me to quickly ask Master Jia to go over." Feng Jie heard this and was startled.
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐因夜中之事，心神恍惚不宁，只是一味要强，仍然扎挣起来。正坐著纳闷，忽听个小丫头子在院里问道：“平姑娘在屋里么？”平儿答应了一声。那小丫头掀起帘子进来，却是王夫人打发过来来找贾琏，说：“外头有人回要紧的官事。老爷才出了门，太太叫快请二爷过去呢。”凤姐听见，吓了一跳。

paragraphs.original: 未知何事，下回分解。
paragraphs.english: English translation: "Now I don't know what kind of matter it is, and I'll just wait and see the next time."
paragraphs.chinese: 这下又不知是什么事了，下回就等揭晓了。

title: 《博庭欢宝玉赞孤儿　正家法贾珍鞭悍仆》
